bio:
Azure AppDev/DevOps Specialist with 13 years of software development and architecture experience, 10+ years with Microsoft helping customers transition to the cloud through Apps Modernization, DevOps Adoption, Cloud-native applications, and serverless computing.
•	Lead Overall App Dev and DevOps Engagements for Largest Microsoft Azure customers in the UAE region.
•	Worked on large app modernization and DevOps projects in UAE.
•	Microsoft Worldwide Community lead for ALM and DevOps community.
•	Certified: CKAD-Kubernetes Application Developer, Azure Solutions Architect Expert, Azure DevOps Engineer Expert, Microsoft Certified Trainer 2018-2019, Azure Developer Associate, Scrum Master, SAFe Agilist
